modShortDescription: This mod restores farming to the same style as a19. When harvesting a crop it will return to seedling form and you will never receive a seed.
modDescription:
This mod restores [farming](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-farming/) to the same style as a19\. When harvesting a crop it will return to seedling form and you will never receive a seed.

## Changelog

Changed how I removed the returned seed on harvest (direction provided from Red Eagle LXIX). Also lowered the amount of crops given at harvest to match that of a19.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Syco54645/Syco54645A20ModletsXML/tree/main/Syco54645-A19_Farming_For_A20)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26052-a19-farming-for-a20/).

**Credits:** Syco54645
